list.name: Changes
list.comment:
refactor: Overhaul project structure and tooling
- chore(tooling): Migrate from Biome to ESLint and Prettier - Add ESLint configuration files - Add Prettier configuration files - Remove Biome configuration files - feat(core): Enhance core package functionality - Add bitfield.ts library for flag operations - Add emojis.ts structure for emoji handling - build: Update build process - Optimize tsup configuration - Update TypeScript configuration - style: Convert LF to CRLF line endings across multiple files - chore(ide): Update IDE-specific settings - Add new inspection profiles - Update JavaScript linter settings

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment:
refactor: restructure entire project
- Remove turborepo template structure - Add new project structure for nyx.js - Create new configuration files (.gitignore, .npmrc, package.json, etc.) - Add LICENSE and README.md - Set up new workspace configuration - Remove old apps (docs, web) and packages (ui, eslint-config, typescript-config) - Add placeholder directories for apps, configs, and packages - Update IDE settings - Adjust line endings from LF to CRLF in various files

task.summary:
chore: update project configuration and structure
- Add .gitignore and .gitkeep files - Update core package files (package.json, index.ts, LICENSE) - Add build configuration (tsbuildinf, biome.json, tsconfig.json, tsup.config.ts) - Update project-wide configuration (pnpm-lock.yaml, turbo.json) - Add test file (test.ts) - Update IDE settings (workspace.xml) - Add Husky pre-commit hook - Configure TypeScript and Biome
This commit reorganizes the project structure, updates build tools, and improves development configuration.

feat(core): Add format, markdown, and type utilities
- Add formats.ts for handling data formats - Add markdowns.ts for Markdown processing - Add types.ts for TypeScript type definitions

PS C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js> git add . && git commit -m "test" warning: in the working copy of '.idea/workspace.xml', LF will be replaced by CRLF the next time Git touches it warning: in the working copy of 'packages/core/src/index.ts', LF will be replaced by CRLF the next time Git touches it warning: in the working copy of 'packages/core/src/libs/types.ts', LF will be replaced by CRLF the next time Git touches it warning: in the working copy of 'packages/core/src/enums/apis.ts', LF will be replaced by CRLF the next time Git touches it warning: in the working copy of 'packages/core/src/enums/intents.ts', LF will be replaced by CRLF the next time Git touches it warning: in the working copy of 'packages/core/src/enums/locales.ts', LF will be replaced by CRLF the next time Git touches it warning: in the working copy of 'packages/core/src/enums/mimes.ts', LF will be replaced by CRLF the next time Git touches it warning: in the working copy of 'packages/core/src/enums/oauth2.ts', LF will be replaced by CRLF the next time Git touches it warning: in the working copy of 'packages/core/src/enums/opcodes.ts', LF will be replaced by CRLF the next time Git touches it warning: in the working copy of 'packages/core/src/structures/users.ts', LF will be replaced by CRLF the next time Git touches it
> @nyxjs/monorepo@ format C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js > turbo format
turbo 2.1.2
• Packages in scope: @nyxjs/core • Running format in 1 packages • Remote caching disabled ┌ @nyxjs/core#format > cache hit, replaying logs 3f8bbe6aaa00d09e │ │ > @nyxjs/core@ format C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js\packages\core │ > biome format --write src │ │ Formatted 11 files in 4ms. No fixes applied. └────>
Tasks: 1 successful, 1 total Cached: 1 cached, 1 total Time: 91ms >>> FULL TURBO
> @nyxjs/monorepo@ build C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js > turbo build
turbo 2.1.2
• Packages in scope: @nyxjs/core • Running build in 1 packages • Remote caching disabled ┌ @nyxjs/core#build > cache hit, replaying logs a3412a63d74b5f8a │ │ > @nyxjs/core@ build C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js\packages\core │ > tsup && rimraf .tsup │ │ CLI Building entry: src/index.ts │ CLI Using tsconfig: tsconfig.json │ CLI tsup v8.3.0 │ CLI Using tsup config: C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js\packages\core	sup.config.ts │ TSC Build start │ TSC ⚡️ Build success in 912ms │ DTS Build start │ CLI Target: esnext │ Analysis will use the bundled TypeScript version 5.4.2 │ *** The target project appears to use TypeScript 5.6.2 which is newer than the bundled compiler engine; consider upgrading API Extractor. │ Writing package typings: C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js\packages\core\dist\_tsup-dts-rollup.d.ts │ Analysis will use the bundled TypeScript version 5.4.2 │ *** The target project appears to use TypeScript 5.6.2 which is newer than the bundled compiler engine; consider upgrading API Extractor. │ Writing package typings: C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js\packages\core\dist\_tsup-dts-rollup.d.mts │ DTS ⚡️ Build success in 2169ms │ CLI Cleaning output folder │ CJS Build start │ ESM Build start │ ESM dist\esm\index.js 26.85 KB │ ESM dist\esm\index.js.map 55.78 KB │ ESM ⚡️ Build success in 40ms │ CJS dist\index.js 27.80 KB │ CJS dist\index.js.map 57.28 KB │ CJS ⚡️ Build success in 42ms │ TSC Build start │ TSC ⚡️ Build success in 551ms │ DTS Build start │ Analysis will use the bundled TypeScript version 5.4.2 │ *** The target project appears to use TypeScript 5.6.2 which is newer than the bundled compiler engine; consider upgrading API Extractor. │ Writing package typings: C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js\packages\core\dist\_tsup-dts-rollup.d.ts │ Analysis will use the bundled TypeScript version 5.4.2 │ *** The target project appears to use TypeScript 5.6.2 which is newer than the bundled compiler engine; consider upgrading API Extractor. │ Writing package typings: C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js\packages\core\dist\_tsup-dts-rollup.d.mts │ DTS ⚡️ Build success in 1187ms └────>
Tasks: 1 successful, 1 total Cached: 1 cached, 1 total Time: 84ms >>> FULL TURBO
[next 0771833] test 11 files changed, 1394 insertions(+), 29 deletions(-) create mode 100644 packages/core/src/enums/apis.ts create mode 100644 packages/core/src/enums/intents.ts create mode 100644 packages/core/src/enums/locales.ts create mode 100644 packages/core/src/enums/mimes.ts create mode 100644 packages/core/src/enums/oauth2.ts create mode 100644 packages/core/src/enums/opcodes.ts create mode 100644 packages/core/src/structures/users.ts PS C:\Users\minec\WebstormProjects
yx.js> [A#F&#E&#D&eD'#D'#C'

feat(core): Add Discord API enums and user structure
- feat(core): Introduce new enum files for Discord API - Add apis.ts for API-related enumerations - Add intents.ts for Discord Gateway Intents - Add locales.ts for supported locales - Add mimes.ts for MIME types - Add oauth2.ts for OAuth2 scopes - Add opcodes.ts for Gateway opcodes - feat(core): Add users.ts in structures for user-related functionality - chore: Update index.ts to include new enums and structures - style: Convert LF to CRLF line endings in multiple files - build: Optimize tsup build process, resulting in larger bundle size

refactor: Overhaul project structure and tooling
- chore(tooling): Migrate from Biome to ESLint and Prettier - Add ESLint configuration files - Add Prettier configuration files - Remove Biome configuration files - feat(core): Enhance core package functionality - Add bitfield.ts library for flag operations - Add emojis.ts structure for emoji handling - build: Update build process - Optimize tsup configuration - Update TypeScript configuration - style: Convert LF to CRLF line endings across multiple files - chore(ide): Update IDE-specific settings - Add new inspection profiles - Update JavaScript linter settings

MESSAGE.value:
refactor: restructure entire project
- Remove turborepo template structure - Add new project structure for nyx.js - Create new configuration files (.gitignore, .npmrc, package.json, etc.) - Add LICENSE and README.md - Set up new workspace configuration - Remove old apps (docs, web) and packages (ui, eslint-config, typescript-config) - Add placeholder directories for apps, configs, and packages - Update IDE settings - Adjust line endings from LF to CRLF in various files

chore: update project configuration and structure
- Add .gitignore and .gitkeep files - Update core package files (package.json, index.ts, LICENSE) - Add build configuration (tsbuildinf, biome.json, tsconfig.json, tsup.config.ts) - Update project-wide configuration (pnpm-lock.yaml, turbo.json) - Add test file (test.ts) - Update IDE settings (workspace.xml) - Add Husky pre-commit hook - Configure TypeScript and Biome

refactor: Overhaul project structure and tooling
- chore(tooling): Migrate from Biome to ESLint and Prettier - Add ESLint configuration files - Add Prettier configuration files - Remove Biome configuration files - feat(core): Enhance core package functionality - Add bitfield.ts library for flag operations - Add emojis.ts structure for emoji handling - build: Update build process - Optimize tsup configuration - Update TypeScript configuration - style: Convert LF to CRLF line endings across multiple files - chore(ide): Update IDE-specific settings - Add new inspection profiles - Update JavaScript linter settings

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
refactor: Overhaul project structure and tooling
- chore(tooling): Migrate from Biome to ESLint and Prettier - Add ESLint configuration files - Add Prettier configuration files - Remove Biome configuration files - feat(core): Enhance core package functionality - Add bitfield.ts library for flag operations - Add emojis.ts structure for emoji handling - build: Update build process - Optimize tsup configuration - Update TypeScript configuration - style: Convert LF to CRLF line endings across multiple files - chore(ide): Update IDE-specific settings - Add new inspection profiles - Update JavaScript linter settings
